content: is a visitor-supported nonprofit public service. Income from Memberships is essential for continued operation of this service. Please help supply the cash needed to deliver the programming you want—become a Member of

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font i b span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: . Don’t expect others to carry the load—step up now and make a difference!

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: At this time, Memberships are our primary source of revenue to pay the bills.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font strong u span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
html body text table tbody tr td p font em strong span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: are available in the following categories: Child (US$18), Student (US$25), Limited or fixed income (US$20), Individual (US$45), Organizations (US$250), Lifetime (US$1000), and Quantum Benefactor (US$5000). These are

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font em span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: : send us any amount that you can afford and we will include you in our Membership roster! Because ALI is registered as a non-profit, tax-exempt (501[c][3]) organization in the US, the Membership fee is fully tax-deductible for US citizens and residents.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font strong u span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: First and foremost, you will know that you have played a valuable role in sharing the valuable messages of archaeology and indigenous peoples. As a Member of

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font em strong span
html body text table tbody tr td p font span
content: , unless you choose to be anonymous, you will be included on the Membership roll on this website and recognized as one who has stepped forward to support this innovative public service. You will receive a gift as part of your Membership as well as a Membership certificate documenting your support of our valuable work. We will not share your contact information with other organizations. Your Membership can also be obtained through your generous in-kind contribution. This may also be tax-deductible./font>

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font font strong u span
html body text table tbody tr td p font font span
content: Send us your Membership application and fee in one of two ways:

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font font span
content: (1) To sign up and pay for your Membership on-line with your credit card, click on the Network for Good box in the left margin and follow the instructions. If you do not want to be listed as a Member on this web site, either choose the “anonymous” option at Network for Good or send us an

tag: html body text table tbody tr td p font font a span
html body text table tbody tr td p font font span
html body text table tbody tr td p font font span
content: (2) To sign up and pay for your Membership through regular mail, send us your contact information (including e-mail address) and a check or money order to TAC Membership, Archaeological Legacy Institute, P.O. Box 5302, Eugene, OR 97405. Please indicate if you do not want to be listed as a Member on this web site.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font font span span
content: Thanks very much for your kind support!

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p b font span
content: What Membership Fees Will Pay For

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong font u span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Monthly costs of video and audio streaming, which will grow as our web traffic increases.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Upgrading this web site is critical to maintaining its function and attracting an audience.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: , including more audio interviews, commentaries, and news as well as videos from others and our own video productions.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: , which will bring you the sounds and messages of languages threatened with extinction.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
content: Organize an Archaeological Field School for Teachers

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: , to promote and assist in the use of archaeology as a classroom teaching tool.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: to develop and deliver school curricula through

html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: to secure support for TAC programs and development.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
content: Hire two or three paid staff

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: instead of relying completely on volunteer help.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: to play tapes for video capture and encoding and for shooting our own video footage.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font strong span

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span

html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: and develop partnerships that will bring you valuable programming.
